nhc_headline: ...BERYL NOW OVER THE SOUTHERN GULF OF MEXICO.. ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WATCHES EXTENDED EASTWARD ALONG THE  TEXAS COAST...
summary:
...BERYL NOW OVER THE SOUTHERN GULF OF MEXICO.. ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WATCHES EXTENDED EASTWARD ALONG THE  TEXAS COAST...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Fri Jul 5
 the center of Beryl was located near 21.7, -90.2
 with movement WNW at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
